description:

The Mists of Avalon (2001)
--------------------------
 <a href="
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0244353/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0244353/</a>   (6.7, 3547 votes)

Plot: Based on the bestseller by Marion Zimmer Bradley It tells the story of the women behind King Arthur; including his mother, Igraine; his half-sister, Morgaine; his aunt Viviane, the Lady of the Lake; and his wife, Gwenwyfar.  


Specs:
------
Container.........: Mkv              
Audio #1..........: AC3, 5.1, 384kbps, 48kHz, English
Filesize..........: 2.19GB  
Video.............: x264, ~1400kbps, 25FPS, SAR 16:11
Runtime...........: 2h56m
Resolution........: 704x560 (Cropped from 720x576)
Source............: Avalons Dimmor NORDIC PAL DVD9  (Movie 8GB)
Subs..............: English, Dutch, Romanian, Hungarian, Polish, Swedish, Norwegian, Finnish, Danish, French, Turkish


Extras included: Deleted Scenes, 88MB, 1400kbs, english subs. 


Notes: I like this movie, I feel it is the best movie about Camelot and Avalon. Had some feeling that 1400 was a little bit low but after trying diffrent settings I think I managed to get it quite good. Included all subtitles except greek and hebrew, had no clue how to convert that to a SRT. There is a french audiotrack that I can upload if anyone wants it.

Settings I used (x264 v1114): --ref 5 --bframes 4 --b-adapt 2 --direct auto --nf --subme 7 --trellis 2 --partitions p8x8,b8x8,i4x4,i8x8 --8x8dct --me umh --threads auto --progress --sar 16:11 --no-psnr --no-ssim --output

There was a 1 pixel black bar at bottom and left, but I cropped it out.
